name: Hepta Beats
description:
Hepta Beats is a 2D side-view platformer game in which the levels are controlled by the rhythm, predict adversities by following the rhythm to surpass the challenges.

Predict the rhythm of the music to move forward


Creative hand-crafted levels


Die and try again

Features

  • 9 different levels with its own music
  • Rhythm based gameplay
  • Challenging levels
  • Colorfur levels
  • +9 harder levels to come(free DLC)
  • Settings to change the colors (color blind people friendly)
